DOC.brief_summary: Radiofrequency ablation ( RFA ) standard treatment option cavotricuspid isthmus ( CTI ) dependent atrial flutter . We plan perform randomized prospective trial compare efficacy contact force ( CF ) guide CTI ablation catheter ablation operator blind contact force parameter .
DOC.brief_title: Randomised Prospective Trial Comparing Contact Force Non-contact Force Guided Catheter Ablation Cavotricuspid Isthmus Dependent Atrial Flutter
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( age 18 ) 12 lead ECG document paroxysmal persistent CTI dependent atrial flutter plan undergo CTI ablation . Able willing give inform consent . Previous CTI ablation Previous nonCTI dependent atrial flutter ( ie.patients previous history pulmonary vein isolation leave atrial ablation , congenital heart disease , surgical ablation )
